segments.text: Hi , Mike , where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m going to down town .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At this time ? Why don ’ t you go there tomorrow ? It is almost dark .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My boy wants me to buy a toy , so I think I ’ d better satisfy him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I have seen many toys in your home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is none now because he likes to destroy toys .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But if he always destroys toys and asks you to buy new ones , what will you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am annoyed by this , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And you still buy him new ones ?
segments.speaker: S1
